CustomField.description: Initiates the outbound message to Oracle ICS. This is updated when the record is created or modified. Another process can update this field to initiate the outbound message.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Initiates the outbound message to Oracle ICS. This is updated when the record is created or modified. Another process can update this field to initiate the outbound message.
CustomField.label: ERP Submitted To Sync
